comment: This class represents call capabilities that can be used for a call.

chat.comment: Boolean true to enable chat feature in call UI, false otherwise

tags.property: Boolean true to enable chat feature in call UI, false otherwise

fileSharing.comment: Boolean true to enable fileSharing feature in call UI, false otherwise

tags.property: Boolean true to enable fileSharing feature in call UI, false otherwise

screenSharing.comment: Boolean true to enable screenSharing feature in call UI, false otherwise

tags.property: Boolean true to enable screenSharing feature in call UI, false otherwise

whiteboard.comment: Boolean true to enable whiteboard feature in call UI, false otherwise

tags.property: Boolean true to enable whiteboard feature in call UI, false otherwise

withScreenSharing.comment: This function adds screen sharing capability to call UI.

withWhiteboard.comment: This function adds whiteboard capability to call UI.

withChat.comment: This function adds the chat capability to call UI.

withFileSharing.comment: This function adds file sharing capability to call UI.
